constraints: Cameoed in the county fair scene of The Muppet Movie
Has at least one star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame
Recipient of an Emmy Award
Recipient of a Golden Globe Award

problem: According to data collected by Scottish Mountain Rescue Statistics Reports (2019-2023), which year recorded 50 or fewer mountaineering incidents that were classified as ‘Lost’, more than 100 injured individuals from those rescued, 15 incident callouts that were ‘False Alarms’ and more than 3 Equestrian incidents?
question: According to data collected by Scottish Mountain Rescue Statistics Reports (2019-2023), which year recorded 50 or fewer mountaineering incidents that were classified as ‘Lost’, more than 100 injured individuals from those rescued, 15 incident callouts that were ‘False Alarms’ and more than 3 Equestrian incidents?

constraints: According to Scottish Mountain Rescue Statistics Reports (2019–2023)
Mountaineering incidents classified as 'Lost': 50 or fewer
Injured individuals among those rescued: more than 100
Incident callouts classified as 'False Alarms': exactly 15
Equestrian incidents: more than 3

problem: In World Bank Open Data, which region out of China and its SAR (Special Administrative Region) has a crude birth rate of higher than 4 out of 1000, has a population growth lower than 1%, and has an annual GDP growth rate of higher than -5%, in 2022? If there is more than 1 region, then I want the region with lower than 5% in food price inflation in December 2022, according to the World Bank. If there is still more than 1 region then what is the region with a higher than 80 years old in life expectancy in 2022, according to Our World in Data?
question: In World Bank Open Data, which region out of China and its SAR (Special Administrative Region) has a crude birth rate of higher than 4 out of 1000, has a population growth lower than 1%, and has an annual GDP growth rate of higher than -5%, in 2022? If there is more than 1 region, then I want the region with lower than 5% in food price inflation in December 2022, according to the World Bank. If there is still more than 1 region then what is the region with a higher than 80 years old in life expectancy in 2022, according to Our World in Data?

constraints: Region is among China and its Special Administrative Regions (SARs) as defined by the World Bank
Crude birth rate > 4 per 1,000 population in 2022 (World Bank Open Data)
Population growth < 1% in 2022 (World Bank Open Data)
Annual GDP growth rate > -5% in 2022 (World Bank Open Data)
Tie-breaker 1: Food price inflation < 5% in December 2022 (World Bank)
Tie-breaker 2: Life expectancy > 80 years in 2022 (Our World in Data)

problem: Which of the UK-born individuals who won The Nobel Prize in Economic Sciences while being affiliated with a UK based institution, between the inception of the award and the year that the first woman won The Nobel Prize in Economic Sciences, has fewer than 20 "Articles" listed on ideas.repec.org that have a publication year prior to the year that they won the award?
question: Which of the UK-born individuals who won The Nobel Prize in Economic Sciences while being affiliated with a UK based institution, between the inception of the award and the year that the first woman won The Nobel Prize in Economic Sciences, has fewer than 20 "Articles" listed on ideas.repec.org that have a publication year prior to the year that they won the award?

constraints: UK-born individual
Winner of The Nobel Prize in Economic Sciences
Affiliated with a UK-based institution at the time of receiving the prize
Won the prize between the award's inception year and the year the first woman won The Nobel Prize in Economic Sciences
Has fewer than 20 'Articles' listed on ideas.repec.org with publication years prior to their award year
